title: Djokovic in limbo as lawyers fight Australia ban; mother says he is 'prisoner' in hotel
content:
1. Djokovic in limbo as lawyers fight Australia ban; mother says he is 'prisoner' in hotel  Reuters
  2. Novak Djokovic to remain in visa limbo until Monday as he fights deportation from Australia  ESPN
  3. Novak Djokovic refused entry to Australia over vaccine controversy l GMA  ABC News
  4. Self-sabotaging Novak Djokovic deserves criticism, but so do others in this sorry saga  The Guardian
  5. 'He knew the conditions': Rafael Nadal reflects on Novak Djokovic's 'rough situation' ahead of the Australian Open  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
